concept.title: Procedure: Adding, querying, and removing one scheduled backup for the entire NCC VNF

section.p: The procedures in this section can be used to add a scheduled backup for an entire NCC VNF and to remove a scheduled backup for an entire NCC VNF.
See for instruction about how to add a scheduled backup using CBAM.
See for instruction about how to query a scheduled backup using CBAM.
See for instruction about how to remove a scheduled backup using CBAM.
